text: Gia Scala (March 3, 1934 â€“ April 30, 1972) was an English-born Italian- American actress and model. She was born in Liverpool. Scala was known for her roles in Tip on a Dead Jockey (1957), The Garment Jungle (1957), The Tunnel of Love (1958), and The Guns of Navarone (1961). Scala died of an accidental ethanol and barbiturate overdose at her home in Los Angeles on April 30, 1972 at the age of 38. ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English models Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian models Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American models Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Liverpool
title: Gia Scala
